Description: This template creates an Autoscaling Group and Launch Configuration to deploy STIG-hardened Enterprise Linux 7 instances to host the RedMine service's web-tier.

AdminPubkeyURL.Description: URL the file containing the admin group's SSH public keys.

AmiId.Description: ID of the AMI to launch

AppVolumeDevice.Description: (Optional) Device to mount an extra EBS volume. Leave blank to launch without an extra application volume

AppVolumeMountPath.Description: Filesystem path to mount the extra app volume. Ignored if "AppVolumeDevice" is blank

AppVolumeSize.Description: Size in GB of the EBS volume to create. Ignored if "AppVolumeDevice" is blank

AppVolumeType.Description: Type of EBS volume to create. Ignored if "AppVolumeDevice" is blank

BackupBucket.Description: S3 Bucket to host backups of GitLab config-data

CfnBootstrapUtilsUrl.Description: (Optional - if AMI contains cfn-bootstrap) URL to aws-cfn-bootstrap-latest.tar.gz

CfnEndpointUrl.Description: (Optional) URL to the CloudFormation Endpoint. e.g. https://cloudformation.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

CfnGetPipUrl.Description: (Optional - if AMI contains cfn-bootstrap) URL to get-pip.py

DbAdminName.Description: Name of the RedMine master database-user.

DbAdminPass.Description: Password of the RedMine master database-user.

DbFqdn.Description: Fully-qualified domainname of the RedMine database host.

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of instances in the Autoscaling Group

Domainname.ConstraintDescription: An alphanumeric string to complete the domain portion of the instance's FQDN.
Domainname.Description: Suffix for RedMine's hostname and DNS record

ElbArn.Description: Elastic Load-Balancer to associate EC2 resources to.

EpelRepo.ConstraintDescription: An alphanumeric string that represents the EPEL yum repo's label.

Hostname.ConstraintDescription: An alphanumeric string to complete the hostname portion of the instance's FQDN.
Hostname.Description: Node-name for RedMine's hostname and DNS record

InstanceRole.Description: (Optional) IAM instance-role name used by cfn-init to authenticate to the CloudFormation endpoint.

InstanceRoleProfile.Description: (Optional) IAM instance-role profile to apply to the instance(s)

KeyPairName.Description: Public/private key pairs allow you to securely connect to your instance after it launches

MaxCapacity.Description: Maximum number of instances in the Autoscaling Group

MinCapacity.Description: Minimum number of instances in the Autoscaling Group

NoPublicIp.Description: Controls whether to assign the instance a public IP. Recommended to leave at "true" _unless_ launching in a public subnet

NoReboot.Description: Controls whether to reboot the instance as the last step of cfn-init execution

NoUpdates.Description: Controls whether to run yum update during a stack update (on the initial instance launch, Watchmaker _always_ installs updates)

RedmineAppinstallScript.Description: URL of the script that installs/configures RedMine

RedmineHelperLocation.Description: URL-root of location hosting ancilllary install files.

RedmineOsPrepUrl.Description: URL to script that prepares the EC2 instance for a RedMine install.

RedmineProxyFqdn.Description: Fully-qualified domainname of the RedMine reverse-proxy host.

RedmineShareType.Description: Type of network share hosting shared RedMine content.

SecurityGroupIds.Description: List of security groups to apply to the instance(s)

SubnetIds.Description: List of subnets to associate to the Autoscaling Group

ToggleCfnInitUpdate.Description: A/B toggle that forces a change to instance metadata, triggering the cfn-init update sequence

ToggleNewInstances.Description: A/B toggle that forces a change to instance userdata, triggering new instances via the Autoscale update policy

WatchmakerConfig.Description: (Optional) URL to a Watchmaker config file

WatchmakerEnvironment.Description: Environment in which the instance is being deployed

WatchmakerS3Source.Description: Flag that tells watchmaker to use its instance role to retrieve watchmaker content from S3
